channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's historic criminal hush money trial continues
item.description: Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial continues in New York. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Trump trial live updates: Michael Cohen expected to testify Monday, sources say
item.description: Follow the latest developments in former President Donald Trump's criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel would fight with its "fingernails" if necessary after President Joe Biden's ultimatum that a major Israeli offensive in the Gazan city of Rafah would result in a shut-off of some US weapons. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Steve Bannon's contempt of Congress conviction upheld by appeals court
item.description: A federal appeals court upheld the criminal conviction of Steve Bannon for defying a subpoena from the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack.

item.title: May 9, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said US President Joe Biden made a mistake after the US paused sending a shipment of bombs to Israel so that they would not used in an invasion of the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Pope urges Italians to have babies as a measure of hope for future
item.description: Pope Francis has pressed his campaign to urge Italians to have children

item.title: Stormy Daniels wraps up testimony in Trump hush money trial
item.description: The testimony of adult film actress Stormy Daniels, a central figure in the criminal case against Donald Trump, wrapped on Thursday after the former president's lawyers continued their attack on her credibility.

item.title: Hopes fading for 44 workers still missing days after South Africa building collapse
item.description: Hope is fading for dozens of workers buried for days in the rubble of a building that collapsed in South Africa

item.title: WATCH: Breakthrough helps deaf baby hear for the first time
item.description: An 18-month-old has become the first person to successfully undergo a new form of gene therapy. ABC News' Andrea Fujii explains.
